Subject: Proposal for 3 kWp Grid Tied Solar PV Power Plant under Net Metering scheme


Respected Sir,


This has a reference to our earlier discussions and site survey conducted by our Executive, We understand the requirement of solar power System to reduce the power bills efficiently by utilize the available roof top space.


PRICE AND COMMERCIAL TERMS

Imp Notes (Applicable If Any): sdf

Scope Considerations along with BOM:


1. Design, Engineering, Supply, Installation & Commissioning along with Testing of Solar PV System.


2. BOM & Particulars:


a. Solar PV Module Make - Premier / Pennar / Equivalent


b. Module mounting structures - Suntek make


c. Solar Inverters - Growatt make / Equivalent.


d. DC / AC cabling (Polycab Make), DC Cable of Maximum 15 Meters per String & AC Cable of Maximum 5 Meters. Suntek will bill extra for additional Cables in separate Invoice.


f. Separate Earthing for DC, AC Systems will be provided, where as all Civil works & Earthpit digging works are in Client Scope


g. Protection Systems (Lighting Arrestors (for>5 kWp), AC & DC Distribution Box of Siemens Make


h. In Built Data Logging Equipment (client need to provide wifi(non Jio) at Inverter place at time of installation).


General Terms & Conditions

1) PRICE: Any change in scope of work or addition to the bill of materials and/or ratings or any variation, whatsoever, shall be charged extra to Customer.

2) PAYMENT TERMS:
a) 80% along with purchase order
b) 20% against Invoice & DC (before material dispatch).

3) Order Cancellation Charges :
a) Before feasibility release 5% of Billing amount & Application Charges (TSSPDCL).
b) After feasibility release 10% of Billing amount & Application Charges (TSSPDCL & TSREDCO).
c) After In-principle from TSREDCO 20% of Billing amount & Application Charges.


4) DELIVERY & HANDOVER: Suntek shall complete the project in 25 Days(upto 50 kWp) from date of approvals from Feasibility and In-principle sanction from TSREDCO, Feasibility report from TSSPDCL.Project shall be deemed to have been handed over to Customer by Suntek, on commissioning of the solar plant (Excluding Meter Fixing as its purely depends on Net meter availability & TSSPDCL Team responses)

5) WARRANTY: The solar power plant carries a five (5) years warranty from the date of invoice, as per existing warranty policy of Suntek Energy Systems. Solar photovoltaic modules carry a performance warranty against excess of 80% degradation in twenty five (25) years as per existing warranty policy of Suntek. * Warranty not applicable for Electrical accessories like MCB's, SPD's, etc. as these are protecting devices.

6) SECURITY & SAFETY: On delivery of supplies to site in good condition, Client shall be responsible for safety & security of the materials till handing over of the same to Suntek designated personnel for installation.

7) Remote Monitoring: Remote Monitoring Service will be provided from Suntek & It's Mandatory as per Subsidy norms, More over this will be useful to any client to track the system performance. If this is not activated in 3 working days from the date of system installation, Suntek will charge extra @ 500/- + GST.
Once WIFI Configuration done client shall not change the wifi user id & password. *** END OF DOCUMENT ***
ReConfiguration Charges are extra at Rs. 500/- + GST for each time.


-Regards Kishan Arjun

M/S. Suntek Energy Systems (P) Ltd
Plot No:77, Subhodaya Colony,
Allwyn Colony Road, Kukatpally, Hyd - 72
